agreementTextGeneralEmailCleanerSettings:
Agreement,

I agree that the web app {MYAPP} can connect to my email account {EMAILADDRESS}, using my saved access data, if the 'Create spam folder' function is activated, create the folder with the name i have chosen and move or delete emails according to my settings.
